title: Italian Pasta & Kidney Bean Soup
directions: Peel and chop the onion and garlic cloves. Wash and chop the celery leaving the leaves for later use. Fry the onions, garlic and celery in a little oil until they soften. Add the tomatoes with sauce and vegetable stock to the pan. Stir in the tomato puree, bay leaves and oregano. Season with salt, pepper and sugar and bring to the boil. Place a lid on the pan and leave to simmer for 15 minutes, and then remove the bay leaves.

Drain the kidney beans. Bring a pot of salted water to a boil and add pasta. Leave to boil for 11 minutes or until al dente. Drain the pasta then add to the soup along with the beans. Season to taste. Rinse off the celery leaves and mixed herbs, chop and add to the soup. Serve immediately.
